text: Ya ku waɗanda suka yi imani! Idan kun yi tafiya (a cikin ƙasa), domin jihadi, to, ku nemi bayani.* Kuma kada ku ce wa wanda ya jifa sallama zuwa gare ku: "Ba Musulmi kake ba." Kuna neman hajar rayuwar duniya, to, a wurin Allah akwai ganimomi masu yawa. Kamar wannan ne kuka kasance a gabanin ku musulunta, sa'an nan Allah Ya yi muku falala. Saboda haka ku zan neman bayani. Lalle ne Allah Ya kasance, ga abin da kuke aikatawa, Masani
